title: 彬彬有礼的劫匪...
author: Bruce.Owen
txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 stalincenlam 于 2012-3-9 19:35 编辑 

他说他已经走投无路了，迫不得已他也不想的，他不想伤害到人。我好想还听到他是为了他的孩子。。。老人也不为难他了，真好啊

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
Dude?    Could you do me a favor?

yeah?

to, er..., empty that till for me please....put that right here. I’m robbing you, sir.

Are you sure?

Yes, I’m sure.

Why do you want to do that?

Because I need the money. I have kids that need to be fed, sir.

(Apologizing refering to:  kids to be fed/rent to pay/)
